Reviews.Title: “Good Stay... for the Price!”
Reviews.Author: jarIndiana
Reviews.Content: noticed mixed reviews property 2 weeks ago stayed hotel reserved aaa rate 6000 king sized bed coffee maker microwave minifridge la quinta close nice eateries local shopping cant speak else clean fairly modern looking gentleman front desk fantastic job hospitality utilize indoor pool services value recieved price recommend travelers decent value money stay luck travels

Reviews.Title: “very nice”
Reviews.Author: teresa226
Reviews.Content: checking person friendly hallways bright attractive clean wll designed furniture clean carpet super comfortable bed plenty spare outlets ipods laptops cell phone charging bathroom nice elevators fast overall nice stay

Reviews.Title: “Cheap in more ways then one”
Reviews.Author: chicagotoots
Reviews.Content: location friendly service beautiful indoor heated pool clean comfortable breakfast lq standard pet friendly decent price travel pet attained elite status bottled water snack dont tell bottle water snack elite count sharing bottle water
